column1: drifting into leg, he drives off a thick inside edge through square leg
full on off, he drives firmly to long on
sweeps powerfully behind square from outside off! He reached well outside off, used the past and swept it well behind square
full on leg, he works through square leg
tossed up on off, he drives back to the bowler
full on off, he drives to long on
shorter length, 134kph, on off, he stands up and defends
back of a length outside off, he stands tall and punches this to deep cover-point
full on middle, he whips this through square leg
good length, on off, he defends on the front foot
134kph, fuller outside off, he leans into a drive to cover
139kph, full outside off, he drives firmly to mid off
shorter length, he walks at the bowler and gets taken on the thigh pad, they pinch a leg bye
back of a length, he walks at him and pulls through midwicket, doesn't time it but they get two
good length, top of leg, he's back and working this behind square
brilliant scoop fine! He got a length ball, he waited until late to set up, gets inside the line and helps it fine with fine leg up
fuller on middle, he gives room to go over the off side but opts to defend
angled into leg stump, he clips this nicely behind square for a couple
slower ball outside off, he drives to cover
shorter slower ball, 114kph, he times a cut nicely past point and it runs quickly over the outfield and they get two
length ball outside off, 129kph, he mistimes a pull wide of mid on
length slower ball, he's back and working it around the corner to backward square
131kph, good length, angled across, he expected the slower ball and missed trying to late cut
slower ball wide of off, he drives to the man at cover but he's right on the circle
he walks at a 131kph back of a length ball, he miscues a cross bat swipe through square leg to the sweeper
another brilliant scoop fine! 131kph, length ball, he's moving outside off and scooping it fine with fine leg up. Great batting

Bowled him! Superb yorker at 143kph! Could not have bowled this better. Speared into the base of off, it beat Inglis for pace as he jammed the bat down. He might have expected another length ball or shorter.
slower ball, 124kph, full toss on leg, he clips this neatly behind square for two
good length, outside off, he tries to drive and gets a thick inside edge onto pad
good length, off stump, he defends to cover-point
he charges and moves leg side, it's a short slower ball wide and he toes it off the bottom edge
129kph, short ball, he's back and pulling to deep square
slower ball, wide of off, he drives but misses
130kph, back of a length wide of off, he punches on the back foot to deep point
he charges and stays leg side, another back of a length slower ball and he mistimes to cover
slower ball, wide again, he cuts hard to deep point
full outside off, he drives to deep cover
length ball, he walks at the bowler and has to defend towards mid on
135kph, full outside off, he mistimes a drive to mid off
134kph, length ball, he walks a couple of steps down and works this square of midwicket into the gap for two
short slower ball, he pulls, completely miscues but his strength ensures it clears mid on and runs away! Raw strength. He got none of that
length ball, outside off, tight to off, he is beaten on the inside edge trying to run to third man
full toss, he advances and drives firmly wide of long off for a couple
drifting into leg, he whips this through midwicket
caught at long on! First ball to spin he tries to launch down the ground but it was a touch too full to get enough elevation and he hit it flat to long on and Ross takes the catch easily
full on middle, he reaches out and paddle sweeps fine for a single
full toss outside off, he drives powerfully to long off
shorter length, he's back and working to short fine
good length outside off, he pushes this to cover
137kph, low full toss, attempted yorker, he's hurried, jamming the bat down
slower ball outside off, he just pushes this to midwicket who is tight
low full toss, 136kph, he drives to mid on who is on the circle
shorter length, he's back and pulling to fine leg
short ball high outside off, he walks at the bowler and then lets it go
slower ball, he flashes and misses
slower ball wide of off, he drives through cover
shorter length, he tries to heave over the leg side and gets a thick inside edge onto pad and it rolls away

caught behind! 105kph, short slower ball gets him. This was banged it as a slower offspinner, but it bounced so slowly off the pitch, he tried to pull but got through it too early, got a thin edge and it just carried to Lenton diving forward
fuller angled into off, he defends on the front foot
138kph, angled onto leg, it hits high on the pad, an appeal foe lbw is turned down by the umpire. It looked high and leg side
full on leg he whips to deep midwicket and takes on the man for a second. He just beats the throw coming back. It was tight
full outside off, he drives to cover
full on leg, he chips a drive wide of long on for two
drifting down leg, he paddles this fine for four! Just got it on the full to get it fine
full outside off, he drives to cover
tossed up, he drives to long on
slower ball outside off, he defends to point
caught at mid on! Banged in back of a length, he stands up and tries to pull over mid on but miscues completely and it floats to mid off where Hales moves forward to take the catch
short ball, he times a pull beautifully wide of mid on! No one has timed a ball first up but that was an excellent controlled pull
slower ball on off, he defends to the gap at cover-point
slower ball wide of off, he drives off a thick edge to third man
slower ball, he pushes this back past the bowler to long on
132kph, fuller outside off, he drives firmly straight of cover for a cover
slower ball on off, he's back and defending to midwicket
fuller outside off, he pushes a drive to point
shorter slower ball, he is back and pulling through midwicket
lofted over long off! Brilliant shot! He picked the slower ball but it was a half-volley and he strides out and lofts it high over long off
short slower ball, he stands up and works it to square leg and they get two
drifting into leg, he tucks this through square leg
leg break outside off, he pushes to cover-point
drifting into leg, he glances this to short fine
delightful reverse paddle! On middle, fired in, he got down early and paddled it fine of short third man and it raced to the rope
misfield at long off! Morris ran past it! Full outside off, he thumps it to long off, Morris runs to his left and runs straight past it! Wow. That was a bad error
drifting into leg, he tucks this to forward square
beaten and it just zips past off! It was a good length and shot low past the inside edge
good length on off, he defends to cover
shorter slower ball, he's back and working this through midwicket
126kph, short outside off, he sits back and pulls hard to deep wide long on
short ball, 128kph, he swivels and controls a pull through midwicket
139kph, length ball, he's angling the bat to run to short third man but can't beat the man
fuller outside off, he drives to deep point
back of a length on off, he punches off the back foot to mid off
fuller on middle, he drives getting a thick inside edge through square leg
good length wide of off, he drives to deep point
full, 144kph, on leg, he drives straight of mid on
length ball angled across, he runs this to short third man
126kph, back of a length, he sits back and late cuts beautifully threading it between short third man and backward point! Good shot
129kph, length outside off, he lofts this inside out over cover, didn't nail but gets two
pulled powerfully over deep backward square! 134kph, short ball, chest high, he swivelled and smoked it behind square!
length on off, he whips this to midwicket
fuller around the wicket, he drives neatly to point
driven magnificently past over! A slower ball but a half volley and he just leans on a superb cover drive placing it in the gap with lovely timing
139kph, good length, he angles the bat and runs it to backward point, Agar fires at the non striker's as Hales jumps back
136kph, short ball, he's back and pulling through midwicket forward of square
fuller angled into off, he whips this to midwicket
elegant cover drive on the up! Slightly over pitched and he leans forward to place this past cover with excellent timing
length ball, he tries to pull but it skids on and he's taken on the thigh
fuller and angled into off, he glances this to fine leg with the angle
tossed up on leg, he clips this with the turn to deep midwicket
tossed up outside off, he drives to cover but Marsh misfields
shorter length, he's back and cutting to point
tossed up wider, he square drives to deep point
full on leg, he sweeps hard to deep backward square
wrong un outside off, he drives to cover
slower ball, grips and stays down a touch, he tries to pull and it comes off the thigh and runs to short third man
short ball, he pulls nicely behind square but only for one
shorter length, on middle, he drives to long on
135kph, straighter length, he clips this through square leg to the sweeper
short slower ball, he waits and slaps a pull shot into the gap behind square! Incredible power. No one has been able to generate bat speed from slower balls to find the rope today. Great skill
128kph, full on leg, he clips this through forward square to deep forward square
shorter length, he's back and cutting hard behind point wide of the sweeper for two
short and wide and again he cuts hard behind square for two more
89kph, tossed up outside off, he stays leg side and scythes this through cover to the rope! Superb cricket shot
93kph, fuller on off, he pushes to the gap at point
full on leg, he skips down and whips to deep midwicket
full on off, he drives nicely to long off
129kph, good length, he guides this to backward point
129kph, length ball, he charges and slices this towards deep point and short of him
length ball, he pulls forward of square to the sweeper
launched over long on! An upper decker! A slower ball in the slot, he picked it, cleared the front leg and lofted this way back. Lovely bat swing and a crisp strike
full outside off, he drove very hard to deep cover
short ball, outside off, he pulls nicely through midwicket
short wrong un, he's back and cutting to deep point
shorter slower leg break, he's back and cutting but mistiming off the bottom edge

top edge caught by Kelly at cover! Slower leg break looped up, he tried to launch over long on, sliced it high off the top edge going against the turn, it went a long way up and Kelly showed a steady head and calm hands to take the catch
86kph, full outside off, he drives to long off
83kph, shorter length, he's back and working this forward of square
full on leg, he whips with the turn to the gap at deep midwicket and they run well
shorter length, he's back and punching to long on
he skips down early, glances this to short fine
drifting way down leg and he lets it go for a wide
drifting down leg, he sweeps straight to short fine. Got away with that
short ball, 97kph he's back and pulling to deep midwicket

he might be run out here! Or Stumped! He's out either way. He went back and tried to late cut, it came off the glove and dropped down to Inglis' foot, Khawaja took off thinking it was a run, but Inglis foot stopped the ball, he stepped on it to stop it, Inglis picked it up and whipped the bails off before Khawaja got back! His bat was on the line. It's given run out because Khawaja attempted to run. Great work by Inglis.
hammers a slog sweep into the gap between long on and deep midwicket first ball!
shorter length, he tries to pull and misses as it stays low and just misses off stump
shorter wrong un, he's back and working this to square leg
reverse sweep to deep point for a single
shorter length, he's back and pulling to deep midwicket
he skipped down the track and defended on the move
full outside off, he drives to long on
good length, on off, he defends from the crease
Bowled him! 148kph, length ball and tailing back into the top of off, Ross stayed leg side trying to cut but it was way too quick and too close and it crashes into the top of off!
full angled into middle, 137kph, he defends to midwicket

nearly bowled, nearly a run out! Panic everywhere! Full and straight nearly sneaking through, gets an inside edge onto pad, it rolls behind to the keeper, he takes off and is sent back, Inglis shies and misses but Morris was well out!
full outside off, hammers a drive straight of mid off and Morkel makes an amazing diving save on the circle! Saved three for sure
140kph, length wide of off, he drives on the up in the air but it lands short of cover and he knocks it down. They only get one
he charges, into the wicket slower ball, he pulls on the move wide of deep long on and they pick up two
128kph, attempted yorker, he charged and gets an inside edge onto pad for a single! The yorker would have been a half volley if he hung back
thumped over long on! 127kph in the slot! Nowhere near the yorker length Kelly wanted, he hung back set himself and crunched it flat into the stands with a glorious swing of the bat
driven over cover and the Thunder win! Another half volley outside off, Morris was waiting and he lofted a cover drive over the man in the circle and away to the rope!
